mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_EMPI_INFO (ID_, MAIN_ID, DOC_ORG, SYSTEM_TYPE, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, DOC_DEPT_CODE, ICD_CODE, ACTIVE_TIME, HEALTH_CODE, CARD_ORG) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE R_EMPI_INFO T SET T.DOC_ORG =#{docOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.SYSTEM_TYPE =#{systemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.CARD_TYPE =#{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.CARD_NO =#{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.DOCTOR_CODE =#{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.DOC_DEPT_CODE =#{docDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.ICD_CODE =#{icdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.ACTIVE_TIME =#{activeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.HEALTH_CODE =#{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.CARD_ORG =#{cardOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE T.MAIN_ID =#{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ACTIVE_TIME || ',' || A.ACTIVE_TIME || ',' || CASE WHEN C.DICT_NAME = '就诊信息' THEN '门诊' ELSE C.DICT_NAME END || ',' || B.DOC_TYPE_CODE || ',' || B.DOC_NO AS CARD_NO FROM R_EMPI_INFO A INNER JOIN R_REGISTER_MAIN B ON A.MAIN_ID = B.ID_ AND B.EMPI_ID = #{empiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN P_DICTIONARY C ON A.HEALTH_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '2f093621d63c472fab7a1b2b360b3354' WHERE A.ICD_CODE = #{icdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.DOC_TYPE_CODE NOT IN ('C00.01.01.00','C00.01.03.00','C00.02.05.00','C00.03.01.00','C00.03.02.01') ORDER BY A.ACTIVE_TIME DESC

SELECT A.ACTIVE_TIME || ',' || D.MD_NAME || ',' || CASE WHEN C.DICT_NAME = '就诊信息' THEN '门诊' ELSE C.DICT_NAME END || ',' || B.DOC_TYPE_CODE || ',' || B.DOC_NO AS CARD_NO FROM R_EMPI_INFO A INNER JOIN R_REGISTER_MAIN B ON A.MAIN_ID = B.ID_ AND B.EMPI_ID = #{empiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN P_DICTIONARY C ON A.HEALTH_CODE = C.DICT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID = '2f093621d63c472fab7a1b2b360b3354' LEFT JOIN MD_ICD_10 D ON A.Icd_Code = D.MD_CODE WHERE A.ACTIVE_TIME >= #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ACTIVE_TIME < #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.DOC_TYPE_CODE NOT IN ('C00.01.01.00','C00.01.03.00','C00.02.05.00','C00.03.01.00','C00.03.02.01') ORDER BY A.ACTIVE_TIME DESC

SELECT A.ACTIVE_TIME || ',' || E.MD_NAME || ',' || D.MD_NAME || ',' || C.DICT_NAME || ',' || B.DOC_NO FROM R_EMPI_INFO A, R_REGISTER_MAIN B, P_DICTIONARY C,BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN D, BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN_STAFF E WHERE A.MAIN_ID = B.ID_ AND C.DICT_CODE = A.DOC_DEPT_CODE AND C.DICTTYPE_ID='DF38A949C56743F99D6667C39CD88182' AND A.DOC_ORG = D.MD_CODE AND A.DOCTOR_CODE = E.MD_CODE AND B.DOC_TYPE_CODE = #{docTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EMPI_ID = #{empiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.ACTIVE_TIME DESC
